name: Duplicate Dissolution
description:
Duplicate Dissolution is a short first-person puzzle game where you utilize your digital duplicates to solve a series of puzzles and conundrums.




Use the duplicates at your disposal in varied situations. In these floors covered by light, where your timing, planning and execution skills will be put to the test, your intelligence is your strongest asset.




Easily command your 3 digital duplicates to work alongside you. You can deploy a duplicate and activate them at any time, materializing what they hold and allowing them to interact with the environment. Overcome obstacles with duplicates that can complete simple tasks like pressing buttons on top of acting as extra weight or even elevation.




Take on the role of NULL, the newest instance of the TESTER program. Created by the Operator; the experienced administrator of the Simulation, you’ll check whether the Simulation is operating smoothly. Run each process to its end and complete the diagnostic.




Delve into the depths of the Simulation as you pass through environments brought to life through futuristic designs and stunning lighting. Traverse the mechanical chambers of secrets of this program alongside your duplicates as a robotic data carrier.


  • Tackle the challenges on your path, only with your duplicates and wits.
  • Complete elaborate puzzle rooms, each comprised of clear and easy to use mechanics.
  • Traverse the pristine, futuristic and darkly luminous chambers of the Simulation.
  • Take in the original atmospheric soundtrack accompanying your adventure.
  • Experience a minimalist narrative where the clues are hidden in the illusive Operator’s words.
